Pinyin1: tāmen bùlái qǐ bùshì gēnghǎo ？
Chinese1: 他们不来岂不是更好？
Translate1: Wouldn't it be better if they didn't come?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhèyàng zuò qǐ bùshì gěi zìjǐ zhǎomáfan ？
Chinese1: 你这样做岂不是给自己找麻烦？
Translate1: Aren't you making trouble for yourself by doing this?

Pinyin1: rúguǒ lián nǐ dōu bù bāng tā ， tā qǐ bùshì sǐdìngle ？
Chinese1: 如果连你都不帮他，他岂不是死定了？
Translate1: If you don't even help him, wouldn't he be dead?

Pinyin1: tā bù zài de shíhou nǐ qù zhǎo tā ， qǐ bùshì làngfèishíjiān ？
Chinese1: 他不在的时候你去找他，岂不是浪费时间？
Translate1: Wouldn't it be a waste of time to find him while he was away?

Pinyin1: zhèmewǎn le tā hái méiyǒu huílai ， mòfēi tāchū le shénme shì ？
Chinese1: 这么晚了他还没有回来，莫非他出了什么事？
Translate1: I haven't come back so late, could something happen?

Pinyin1: zhuōzi shàng nàtiáo yú zěnme bùjiàn le ， mòfēi bèi māo tōuchī le bùchéng ？
Chinese1: 桌子上那条鱼怎么不见了，莫非被猫偷吃了不成？
Translate1: Why is the fish missing from the table? Could it be that the cat stole it?

Pinyin1: mòfēi tā tīngdào le wǒmen de tánhuà ？
Chinese1: 莫非他听到了我们的谈话？
Translate1: Could it be that he overheard our conversation?

Pinyin1: mòfēi tā zhēnde shì nǐ de qīnshēng mǔqīn ？
Chinese1: 莫非她真的是你的亲生母亲？
Translate1: Could it be that she is really your biological mother?

Pinyin1: mòfēi nǐ zhēnde xiāngxìn tā ？
Chinese1: 莫非你真的相信他？
Translate1: Do you really believe him?

Pinyin1: yǒuhuà hǎohǎo shuō ， gànmá fēiděi chǎojià ？
Chinese1: 有话好好说，干嘛非得吵架？
Translate1: If you have something to say, why do you have to fight?

Pinyin1: xiànzài shì jǐnjíqíngkuàng ， fēiděi mǎshàng dòngshǒushù bùkě 。
Chinese1: 现在是紧急情况，非得马上动手术不可。
Translate1: It's an emergency now, and an operation must be performed immediately.

Pinyin1: wǒ jīntiān fēimà tā yīdùn bùxíng ！
Chinese1: 我今天非骂他一顿不行！
Translate1: I must scold him today!

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shì nǐ fēiděi bāng wǒchá qīngchu bùkě ！
Chinese1: 这件事你非得帮我查清楚不可！
Translate1: You have to help me find out about this matter!

Pinyin1: tā zhème zuò tàiguòfēn le ， wǒ fēiděi jiàoxun jiàoxun tā bùkě ！
Chinese1: 他这么做太过分了，我非得教训教训他不可！
Translate1: He's gone too far, I have to teach him a lesson!

Pinyin1: ràng tā zuì nánguò de mòguòyú nǐ duì tā dàhǎndàjiào 。
Chinese1: 让她最难过的莫过于你对她大喊大叫。
Translate1: Nothing will upset her more than you yelling at her.

Pinyin1: wǒnéng xiǎngdào zuì làngmàn de shì mòguòyú gēn nǐ yīqǐ báitóudàolǎo 。
Chinese1: 我能想到最浪漫的事莫过于跟你一起白头到老。
Translate1: The most romantic thing I can think of is growing old together with you.

Pinyin1: tiānqì zhème hǎo ， yǔqí zàijiā kàndiànshì ， bùrú chūqù zǒuzǒu 。
Chinese1: 天气这么好，与其在家看电视，不如出去走走。
Translate1: The weather is so nice, instead of watching TV at home, it's better to go out for a walk.

Pinyin1: yǔqí gān děng ， bùrú xiānqù zhǎodiǎn shì zuò 。
Chinese1: 与其干等，不如先去找点事做。
Translate1: Instead of waiting, find something to do first.

Pinyin1: yǔqí zìjǐ luàn xiǎng ， bùrú dāngmiàn wèn qīngchu 。
Chinese1: 与其自己乱想，不如当面问清楚。
Translate1: Instead of thinking about it yourself, it is better to ask it face to face.

Pinyin1: yǔqí bāngbiérén dǎgōng ， hái bùrú zìjǐ dāng lǎobǎn 。
Chinese1: 与其帮别人打工，还不如自己当老板。
Translate1: It's better to be your own boss than to work for others.

Pinyin1: yǔqí máfan biéren ， bùrú zìjǐ xiǎng bànfǎ 。
Chinese1: 与其麻烦别人，不如自己想办法。
Translate1: Instead of bothering others, it is better to find a way by yourself.

Pinyin1: tāmen liǎ hǎo dé gēn qīnjiěmèi shìde 。
Chinese1: 她们俩好得跟亲姐妹似的。
Translate1: They were as good as sisters.

Pinyin1: zuìjìn tiānqì rèdé gēn zài zhēnglóng lǐ shìde 。
Chinese1: 最近天气热得跟在蒸笼里似的。
Translate1: The weather has been so hot recently that it's like being in a steamer.

Pinyin1: bié gēn tā shìde yītiāndàowǎn hàochīlǎnzuò 。
Chinese1: 别跟他似的一天到晚好吃懒做。
Translate1: Don't be lazy all day long like him.

Pinyin1: tā zuò zhège zuì náshǒu le ， gēn hěn qīngsōng shìde jiù zuòhǎo le 。
Chinese1: 他做这个最拿手了，跟很轻松似的就做好了。
Translate1: He is the best at this, and he does it with ease.

Pinyin1: wǒmen jiā yóu wǒ māma zuòzhǔ ， tā shuō shénme wǒ hé bàba jiù zuò shénme 。
Chinese1: 我们家由我妈妈做主，她说什么我和爸爸就做什么。
Translate1: My mother is in charge of our family, and my father and I will do what she says.

Pinyin1: liàng tā yě bùgǎn ！
Chinese1: 谅他也不敢！
Translate1: Forgive him for not daring!

Pinyin1: wǒliàng nǐ yě bùgǎn gēn nàgè nǚ de jiǎnghuà ！
Chinese1: 我谅你也不敢跟那个女的讲话！
Translate1: he sure dare not

Pinyin1: wǒliàng tā yě méi dǎnliàng zuòchū zhèyàng de shìqing lái 。
Chinese1: 我谅他也没胆量做出这样的事情来。
Translate1: He didn't have the courage to do such a thing.

Pinyin1: tā shì liàng nǐ bùgǎn qù tóusù cái zhème shuō de ， nǐ kě bùnéng jiù zhème suànle ！
Chinese1: 他是谅你不敢去投诉才这么说的，你可不能就这么算了！

Pinyin1: wǒ de tóngshì shì yīgè hěn chéngshí de rén ， tā bùxiè shuōhuǎng 。
Chinese1: 我的同事是一个很诚实的人，他不屑说谎。
Translate1: He said that because he thought you didn't dare to complain, you can't just let it go!

Pinyin1: chūmén méiyǒu dài qián ， bùdébù xiàng péngyou jiè 。
Chinese1: 出门没有带钱，不得不向朋友借。
Translate1: I didn't bring any money with me when I went out, so I had to borrow it from my friends.

Pinyin1: hěn xǐhuan nà jiàn yīfú ， kěshì méi dàigòu qián ， zhǐhǎo bùmǎi le 。
Chinese1: 很喜欢那件衣服，可是没带够钱，只好不买了。
Translate1: I like that dress very much, but I didn't bring enough money, so I had no choice but to not buy it.

Pinyin1: gāngxià fēijī ， hái méi zhǎodào bīnguǎn ， xíngli zhǐhǎo jìcún zài péngyou nà 。
Chinese1: 刚下飞机，还没找到宾馆，行李只好寄存在朋友那。

Pinyin1: pòyú shēngjì ， tā bùdébù dào dàchéngshì qù dǎgōng 。
Chinese1: 迫于生计，他不得不到大城市去打工。
Translate1: I just got off the plane and haven't found a hotel yet, so I had to store my luggage with a friend.

Pinyin1: méiyǒu tā de bāngmáng ， wǒ zhǐhǎo kào zìjǐ le 。
Chinese1: 没有他的帮忙，我只好靠自己了。
Translate1: Without his help, I was on my own.

Pinyin1: wàimiàn xià dàyǔ le ， wǒ zhǐhǎo bù chūqù le 。
Chinese1: 外面下大雨了，我只好不出去了。
Translate1: It was raining heavily outside, so I had no choice but to go out.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhème zuò ， xiàoguǒ fǎnér bùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 你这么做，效果反而不好。
Translate1: If you do this, the effect will be bad.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhème zuò ， fǎnér xiàoguǒ bùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 你这么做，反而效果不好。
Translate1: If you do this, the effect will not be good.

Pinyin1: wàimiàn xiàyǔ ， wǒ què méidài sǎn 。
Chinese1: 外面下雨，我却没带伞。
Translate1: It's raining outside, but I don't have an umbrella.

Pinyin1: wǒ bāng le tā ， tā què bù gāoxìng le 。
Chinese1: 我帮了他，他却不高兴了。
Translate1: I helped him, but he was not happy.

Pinyin1: wǒ bāng le tā ， tā fǎnér bù gāoxìng le 。
Chinese1: 我帮了他，他反而不高兴了。
Translate1: I helped him, but he was not happy.

Pinyin1: wǒ bāng le tā nàme duō ， tā bùdàn méi xièxie wǒ ， fǎnér yǒudiǎn bù gāoxìng 。
Chinese1: 我帮了他那么多，他不但没谢谢我，反而有点不高兴。
Translate1: I helped him so much, but instead of thanking me, he was a little unhappy.

Pinyin1: tā jièqián bùdàn bù huán ， fǎnér huán bù chéngrèn 。
Chinese1: 他借钱不但不还，反而还不承认。
Translate1: Not only did he not repay the loan, but he refused to admit it.

Pinyin1: tālí zhèlǐ zuìyuǎn ， fǎnér què dìyīgè dào 。
Chinese1: 他离这里最远，反而却第一个到。
Translate1: He is the farthest away from here, but he is the first to arrive.

Pinyin1: wǒ gàosu tā yào xiàyǔ ， tā què piānbùdài sǎn 。
Chinese1: 我告诉他要下雨，他却偏不带伞。
Translate1: I told him it was going to rain, but he didn't bring an umbrella.

Pinyin1: suīrán wǒmen bùshì péngyou ， wǒ què bùnéngbù gàosu nǐ 。
Chinese1: 虽然我们不是朋友，我却不能不告诉你。
Translate1: Although we are not friends, I can't help but tell you.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan chī tiánshí ， dànshì què cóng bùchī qiǎokèlì 。
Chinese1: 她喜欢吃甜食，但是却从不吃巧克力。
Translate1: She has a sweet tooth, but never chocolate.

Pinyin1: wǒ gēnběn bù zhīdào rúhé yǒuxiào de guǎnlǐ 。
Chinese1: 我根本不知道如何有效地管理。
Translate1: I simply don't know how to manage effectively.

Pinyin1: nǐ wèishénme shuō zuótiān zài jiēshang kàndào wǒ le ？
Chinese1: 你为什么说昨天在街上看到我了？
Translate1: Why do you say you saw me on the street yesterday?

Pinyin1: tā zhǐshì yīgè xiǎoháizi ， gēnběn méijiàn guò zhème xiàrén de shìqing 。
Chinese1: 他只是一个小孩子，根本没见过这么吓人的事情。
Translate1: He was just a child, and he had never seen such a scary thing.

Pinyin1: jīntiān xīn tóngshì yòu chídào le ， tā dàodǐ xiǎng bùxiǎng zài zhèlǐ zuò le ？
Chinese1: 今天新同事又迟到了，他到底想不想在这里做了？
Translate1: Today's new colleague is late again, does he really want to do it here?

Pinyin1: nǐ de bāo zhème zhòng ！ nǐ dàodǐ dài le duōshǎo dōngxi ？
Chinese1: 你的包这么重！你到底带了多少东西？
Translate1: Your bag is so heavy! How many things did you bring?

Pinyin1: huìyì yǐjīng kāi le liǎnggè xiǎoshí le ， wǒmen dàodǐ shénme shíhou jiéshù ？
Chinese1: 会议已经开了两个小时了，我们到底什么时候结束？
Translate1: The meeting has been going on for two hours, when exactly do we end?

Pinyin1: wǒ gēnběn bù zhīdào wèishénme wǒ nǚpéngyou hěn shēngqì 。
Chinese1: 我根本不知道为什么我女朋友很生气。
Translate1: I have no idea why my girlfriend is so mad.

Pinyin1: tā gēnběn méiyǒu tīng wǒ dehuà 。
Chinese1: 他根本没有听我的话。
Translate1: He didn't listen to me at all.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn hái méiyǒu tòulù wǒmen dàodǐ néngfā duōshǎo jiǎngjīn .
Chinese1: 老板还没有透露我们到底能发多少奖金.
Translate1: The boss has not disclosed how much bonus we will be able to pay.

Pinyin1: nàme ， nǐmen dàodǐ wèishénme bù hējiǔ ne ？
Chinese1: 那么，你们到底为什么不喝酒呢？
Translate1: So why on earth don't you drink alcohol?

Pinyin1: jùshí bàodào
Chinese1: 据实报道
Translate1: factual report

Pinyin1: gēnjù shìshí bàodào
Chinese1: 根据事实报道
Translate1: factual report

Pinyin1: jùshuō tā qù shànghǎi le 。
Chinese1: 据说他去上海了。
Translate1: It is said that he went to Shanghai.

Pinyin1: jù tā shuō ， zāiqíng bìng bùshì hěn yánzhòng 。
Chinese1: 据他说，灾情并不是很严重。
Translate1: According to him, the disaster was not very serious.

Pinyin1: gēnjù tā de shuōfa ， zāiqíng bìng bùshì hěn yánzhòng 。
Chinese1: 根据他的说法，灾情并不是很严重。
Translate1: According to him, the disaster was not very serious.

Pinyin1: jù wǒ kànlai ， tā shì gè hěn fùzé rèn de rén 。
Chinese1: 据我看来，他是个很负责任的人。
Translate1: From my point of view, he is a very responsible person.

Pinyin1: gēnjù wǒ de kànfǎ ， tā shì gè hěn fùzé rèn de rén 。
Chinese1: 根据我的看法，他是个很负责任的人。
Translate1: According to my opinion, he is a very responsible person.

Pinyin1: huīfù tǐlì 。
Chinese1: 恢复体力。
Translate1: Physical recovery.

Pinyin1: dìtiě huīfù le zhèngcháng yùnxíng 。
Chinese1: 地铁恢复了正常运行。
Translate1: The subway resumed normal operation.

Pinyin1: tā de shēntǐ huīfù le 。
Chinese1: 他的身体恢复了。
Translate1: His body recovered.

Pinyin1: shèhuìzhìxù huīfù le 。
Chinese1: 社会秩序恢复了。
Translate1: Social order was restored.

Pinyin1: tā de zhíwèi huīfù le 。
Chinese1: 他的职位恢复了。
Translate1: His post was restored.

Pinyin1: huányuán lìshǐ de zhēnxiàng 。
Chinese1: 还原历史的真相。
Translate1: Restore the truth of history.

Pinyin1: wǒ dǎ tā ， tā jūrán méikū 。
Chinese1: 我打他，他居然没哭。
Translate1: I hit him, but he didn't cry.

Pinyin1: jīngguò zhìliáo ， tā de bìngqíng bùjǐn méiyǒu hǎozhuǎn ， fǎnér èhuà le 。
Chinese1: 经过治疗，他的病情不仅没有好转，反而恶化了。
Translate1: After treatment, his condition not only did not improve, but worsened.

Pinyin1: chī le zhèxiē jiǎnféiyào ， bùdàn méiyǒu shòu ， fǎnér gēng pàng le 。
Chinese1: 吃了这些减肥药，不但没有瘦，反而更胖了。
Translate1: After taking these weight loss pills, not only did I not lose weight, but I got fatter.

Pinyin1: yǔ bùjǐn méitíng ， fǎnér yuèxià yuè dà le 。
Chinese1: 雨不仅没停，反而越下越大了。
Translate1: Not only did the rain not stop, but it became heavier and heavier.

Pinyin1: yōuxiù de bǎngyàng nénggòu jīlì gēng duō de rén 。
Chinese1: 优秀的榜样能够激励更多的人。
Translate1: Good role models can inspire more people.

Pinyin1: rènzhēnduìdài měiyījiàn shìqing 。
Chinese1: 认真对待每一件事情。
Translate1: Take everything seriously.

Pinyin1: duì bǐqǐ zuótiān ， jīntiāntiānqì gēng lěng le 。
Chinese1: 对比起昨天，今天天气更冷了。
Translate1: Compared with yesterday, the weather is colder today.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuìjìn mángyú fùxíkǎoshì 。
Chinese1: 我最近忙于复习考试。
Translate1: I've been busy studying for exams recently.

Pinyin1: tā hěnkuài jiù huì bǎ chēkāi huíjiā 。
Chinese1: 他很快就会把车开回家。
Translate1: He'll be driving the car home soon.

Pinyin1: háizi men dōu hěn xǐhuan yóuyǒng ma ？
Chinese1: 孩子们都很喜欢游泳吗？
Translate1: Do the kids love swimming?

Pinyin1: dāng nǐ qù shànghǎi ， nǐ huì jīnglì hěnduō bù yīyàng de shìqing 。
Chinese1: 当你去上海，你会经历很多不一样的事情。
Translate1: When you go to Shanghai, you will experience many different things.

Pinyin1: liǎnggè xīngqī qián ， tā qù shànghǎi lǚxíng le 。
Chinese1: 两个星期前，他去上海旅行了。
Translate1: He traveled to Shanghai two weeks ago.

Pinyin1: nǐ rúguǒ dàizàijiālǐ ， jiù bùhuì yǒu zhème duō de máfan 。
Chinese1: 你如果待在家里，就不会有这么多的麻烦。
Translate1: If you stayed at home, you wouldn't have so much trouble.

Pinyin1: zhèjiā shāngdiàn de fúwù hěn zhōudào ， jīhū měige gùkè dōu mǎnyì 。
Chinese1: 这家商店的服务很周到，几乎每个顾客都满意。
Translate1: The store's service is very attentive, and almost every customer is satisfied.

Pinyin1: tā bǐ yǐqián biànde gèngjiā kāilǎng le 。
Chinese1: 她比以前变得更加开朗了。
Translate1: She has become more cheerful than before.

Pinyin1: wǒmen juédìng zài míngnián chūntiān dùjià 。
Chinese1: 我们决定在明年春天度假。
Translate1: We have decided to take a vacation next spring.

Pinyin1: nǐ yuànyì qù tàiguó dùjià ma ？
Chinese1: 你愿意去泰国度假吗？
Translate1: Would you like to go to Thailand for vacation?

Pinyin1: xǔduō rén dōu cānjiā le zhècì yīliáo huódòng 。
Chinese1: 许多人都参加了这次医疗活动。
Translate1: Many people participated in this medical activity.

Pinyin1: tā yī huíjiā jiù gěi fùmǔ bàogào tā de chéngjì 。
Chinese1: 他一回家就给父母报告他的成绩。
Translate1: He reports his grades to his parents as soon as he gets home.

Pinyin1: měicì tā shuōhuà wǒmen dōu zūnzhòng tā de yìjiàn 。
Chinese1: 每次他说话我们都尊重他的意见。
Translate1: Every time he speaks we respect his opinion.

Pinyin1: nǐ qù shàngbān qījiān ， nǐ huì xuédào gēng duō de zhīshi 。
Chinese1: 你去上班期间，你会学到更多的知识。
Translate1: When you go to work, you will learn more knowledge.

Pinyin1: jīntiāntiānqì zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 今天天气怎么样？
Translate1: How's the weather today?

Pinyin1: nǐ zài zhèlǐ gōngzuò duōjiǔ le ？
Chinese1: 你在这里工作多久了？
Translate1: How long have you been working here?

Pinyin1: nǐ fùmǔ dōu shì zuò shénme de ？
Chinese1: 你父母都是做什么的？
Translate1: What do your parents do?

Pinyin1: wǒmen dōu xīwàng tā jīnnián kěyǐ bìyè 。
Chinese1: 我们都希望他今年可以毕业。
Translate1: We all hope he can graduate this year.

Pinyin1: shàngkèshí ， tā zǒngshì zuòzài zuìhòu yīpái 。
Chinese1: 上课时，她总是坐在最后一排。
Translate1: In class, she always sits in the last row.

Pinyin1: tàiyáng cóng dōngbian shēngqǐ ， yǐ huǎnmàn de bùfá yídòng 。
Chinese1: 太阳从东边升起，以缓慢的步伐移动。
Translate1: The sun rises in the east and moves at a slow pace.

Pinyin1: yǒushí wǒmen xūyào zuò yīxiē yǒu yìyì de shìqing lái mǎnzú zìjǐ 。
Chinese1: 有时我们需要做一些有意义的事情来满足自己。
Translate1: Sometimes we need to do something meaningful to satisfy ourselves.

Pinyin1: jīnqián bùshì yīqiè ， dàn tā shì kuàilè de gēnběn 。
Chinese1: 金钱不是一切，但它是快乐的根本。
Translate1: Money is not everything, but it is the root of happiness.

Pinyin1: tāmen zhèngzài liànxí quánxīn de wǔdǎo dòngzuò 。
Chinese1: 他们正在练习全新的舞蹈动作。
Translate1: They are practicing brand new dance moves.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào zěnme qù gòuwùzhōngxīn ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道怎么去购物中心吗？
Translate1: Do you know how to get to the mall?

Pinyin1: tā yīzhí zài zhǎo gōngzuò ， dàn bù chénggōng 。
Chinese1: 他一直在找工作，但不成功。
Translate1: He has been looking for work, but without success.

Pinyin1: zhè běnshū de nèiróng hěn yǒuqù ， nǐ rènwéi ne ？
Chinese1: 这本书的内容很有趣，你认为呢？
Translate1: The content of this book is very interesting, what do you think?
